analyses.title: Hard Architecture Mapping: Agent Control Plane (ACP)
analyses.description: Comprehensive Level 1 technical architecture analysis with 6 capability matrices revealing Infrastructure-as-Conversations paradigm where Kubernetes etcd becomes durable message queue for AI agent orchestration. Covers 32K LOC, 6 CRDs, 5 architectural layers, and evolution from Smallchain experiment to enterprise-grade distributed system.

analyses.strategic_context: Establish technical ground truth for ACP: Kubernetes-native orchestrator treating agent conversations as durable workflows with context windows as execution state, delivering 6 comprehensive matrices per user request
